This game is most likely the best strategic game Online in my opinion. You have to co-ordinate properly with your team mates to win a game if failed to do so. . well in higher MMR bracket i am sure you will lose. But i will say instead reading my ramblings here give a try to this game, You may stick to the game entirely. From me==>This Game is worth giving a try and will recommend to play.

[h1]Dota 2 review[/h1]

[b]I waited 4 years for this game. And after getting on the fucckin' hype train GOING ALL THE WAY AROUND FOR 4 FUCcccKING YEARS ALL I GET IS FUccKIN' SHIiiiiiiT. THIS GAME SUCKS ASSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS[/b]

To be honest I don’t know why people say they hate this game. Dota 2 is by far the best game I’ve ever played, and I think you should play it too. The best thing about this game is the hacking; it makes you think about how real life hacking works. If I was a hacker in real life, all it takes is a button press and you can kill twenty people. This happened with JFK, right? Because we all knew that he was a communistic robot sent out to take the country back from when the Americans took their native-russian land (long live Russia). NATO was a lie, the commies have already infiltrated our society, Brexit was a rigged election, our world was doomed from the second they hacked JFK's (Hard cok) head to self destruct. 

I waited 4 days 3 months and 12 hours for this game I counted down the seconds to download, I remember installing it and the first screen when I booted it up. It was the best part of the game. I never thought I would be more disappointed in anything than my father was in me. This game was the very pinnacle of meh. It was the ultimate mediocrity. It was so O.K that it drove my dog to suicide. I forced my animal to play the game at the computer and he shot himself at how all right it was. GOD I LOVED THAT DOG. I still remember the first time I brought that dog home, there’s still a stain on my ceiling from that nutt. He makes me want to slowly rupture a good nut in the corner of my college class. Just imagine, that hot 83 year old, male teacher watching you NUTTTTTT your heart out. GOD YES! Anyway, back to the dog, he was a hot, young poodle that I got to stick my hard cok in almost every day. It gave me worms, but I enjoyed stirring my hot cuum inside him. 

Fuccck this game; I love it. It is the best worst game I’ve ever played, and I am still loving / hating it. The hacking and proceeded to shoot himself from playing this fuccccking game. I honestly wish I were my dog because I want to be dead after 3 years of playing this asss gaming is the worst thing to do but it still hacks correctly so I guess that’s a plus. You know what wasn’t a plus watching all those fuccccking cops die after I hacked those road barriers. I bet you there was a fuccccking K-9 in one of those cars, those K-9’s remind me of my dead dog. He honestly probably evolved from his stupid biitch mind, e. I would have bought the second game if this game wasn’t so bad. Sometimes I look up and see that stain on my fucccking ceiling, and think about that teacher I hope I go to jail and drop the soap so hard that my aassshole gets penetrated and rips my body in half.

To anyone getting into moba's as a whole this is a great example of a good one, I personally wasn't the biggest fan of moba's in general until I gave this one a good try.

Pros: Lots of characters to suit each type of playstyle. and along with that its easy to transfer skills gained to other more advanced characters.

Cons: pretty much need a team to get anywhere if you are focused on raiting or overall longevity of the game.

𝐌𝐘 𝐓𝐑𝐀𝐃𝐈𝐍𝐆 𝐈𝐍𝐅𝐎𝐑𝐌𝐀𝐓𝐈𝐎𝐍

                                                             I ᴀᴍ 4ʏᴇᴀʀs ɪɴ sᴛᴇᴀᴍ 
                                     I ʜᴀᴠᴇ ᴘʀᴏᴏғ ᴛʜᴀᴛ I ᴄᴀɴ ʀᴇᴀʟʟʏ ʙᴜʏ ᴛʜᴇ ɪᴛᴇᴍ/s I ᴏғғᴇʀᴇᴅ.
                                                  I'ᴠᴇ ɢᴏᴛ ᴀɴ ᴀᴄᴄᴏᴜɴᴛ ᴡʜɪᴄʜ ʟᴏᴏᴋs ᴅᴇᴄᴇɴᴛ. 


-ᴘʟᴇᴀsᴇ ɴᴏᴛᴇ, ᴛʜᴇ ғᴏʟʟᴏᴡɪɴɢ ʀᴜʟᴇs ʜᴀᴠᴇ ʙᴇᴇɴ sᴇᴛ ᴀs ᴀ ʀᴇsᴜʟᴛ ᴏғ ɪɴᴄʀᴇᴀsᴇ ɪɴ ᴛʜᴇ ɴᴜᴍʙᴇʀ ᴏғ ᴛʀᴏʟʟᴇʀs. ɪғ ʏᴏᴜ ᴅᴏ ɴᴏᴛ ᴍᴇᴇᴛ ᴍʏ ʀᴜʟᴇs, ᴘʟᴇᴀsᴇ ᴅᴏ ɴᴏᴛ ᴛᴀᴋᴇ ɪᴛ ᴘᴇʀsᴏɴᴀʟ. ɪ ᴀʙɪᴅᴇ ʙʏ ᴛʜᴇsᴇ ʀᴜʟᴇs 100% ᴀɴᴅ ᴛʜᴇʏ ᴡɪʟʟ ɴᴇᴠᴇʀ ᴄʜᴀɴɢᴇ. ғᴏʀ ᴍᴏʀᴇ ɪɴғᴏʀᴍᴀᴛɪᴏɴ ᴘʟᴇᴀsᴇ ᴅᴏ ɴᴏᴛ ʜᴇsɪᴛᴀᴛᴇ ᴛᴏ ᴀsᴋ.

- ᴀs ᴀ ʙᴜʏ ᴀɴᴅ sᴇʟʟᴇʀ ɪ ɴᴇᴇᴅ ᴛᴏ ʙᴇ sᴜʀᴇ ᴛʜᴀᴛ ʏᴏᴜ ᴀʀᴇ ʀᴇᴀʟʟʏ sᴇʀɪᴏᴜs ᴀʙᴏᴜᴛ ᴛʜᴇ ᴅᴇᴀʟ ᴡᴇ ᴍᴀᴅᴇ ғɪʀsᴛ, ᴅᴜᴇ ᴛᴏ ᴍʏ ᴇxᴘᴇʀɪᴇɴᴄᴇ ɪɴ ᴛʀᴀᴅɪɴɢ. ɪᴠᴇ ʙᴇᴇɴ ғᴏᴏʟᴇᴅ ᴍᴀɴʏ ᴛɪᴍᴇs ʜᴇʀᴇ ɪɴ sᴛᴇᴀᴍ. ᴛʜᴀᴛs ᴡʜʏ ɪ ɴᴇᴇᴅ ᴛᴏ ʙᴇ ᴍᴏʀᴇ ᴄᴀʀᴇғᴜʟ ʙᴇғᴏʀᴇ ɪʟʟ sᴘᴇɴᴅ ᴍʏ ᴍᴏɴᴇʏ ɪɴ ʙᴜʏɪɴɢ ᴛʜᴇ ɪᴛᴇᴍs ᴛʜᴀᴛ ᴡᴇ ʜᴀᴠᴇ ᴀɢʀᴇᴇᴅ. ɪ ɴᴇᴇᴅ ᴛᴏ ʙᴇ sᴜʀᴇ ᴛʜᴀᴛ ᴡʜɪʟᴇ ɪᴍ ʙᴜʏɪɴɢ ᴛʜᴀᴛ ʏᴏᴜ ᴀʀᴇ sᴇʀɪᴏᴜs ᴀɴᴅ ʟᴇɢɪᴛ ᴛʀᴀᴅᴇʀ. ᴀɴᴅ ʏᴏᴜ ᴡɪʟʟ ɴᴏᴛ ᴊᴜsᴛ ʙᴀᴄᴋ ᴏᴜᴛ ᴀɴᴅ ᴀᴄᴄᴇᴘᴛ ᴏᴛʜᴇʀ ʜɪɢʜᴇʀ ᴏғғᴇʀ ᴛʜᴀɴ ᴍɪɴᴇ, ᴡʜɪʟᴇ ɪᴍ ʙᴜʏɪɴɢ ᴛʜᴇ ɪᴛᴇᴍs ɪ ᴏғғᴇʀᴇᴅ ʏᴏᴜ.

-ɪ ᴄᴀɴ ᴀʙʟᴇ ᴛᴏ ᴘʀᴏᴠɪᴅᴇ ᴘʀᴏᴏғ ᴛʜᴀᴛ ɪ ʜᴀᴠᴇ ᴛʜᴇ sᴜғғɪᴄɪᴇɴᴛ ʙᴀʟᴀɴᴄᴇ ᴏɴ ʙɪᴛsᴋɪɴs ɪɴ ᴏʀᴅᴇʀ ᴛᴏ ᴘᴜʀᴄʜᴀsᴇ ᴛʜᴇ ɪᴛᴇᴍ, ᴊᴜsᴛ ᴛᴏ ᴘʀᴏᴠᴇ ᴛᴏ ʏᴏᴜ ɪ ᴀᴍ sᴇʀɪᴏᴜs ᴀʙᴏᴜᴛ ᴍʏ ᴏғғᴇʀ. 

𝐓𝐇𝐈𝐒 𝐈𝐒 𝐓𝐇𝐄 𝐎𝐍𝐋𝐘 𝐖𝐀𝐘 𝐈 𝐃𝐎 𝐓𝐑𝐀𝐃𝐄

ᴇxᴘʀᴇss ᴛʀᴀᴅᴇ : sᴏ ᴡᴇ ᴄᴀɴ ᴀᴠᴏɪᴅ 𝟽ᴅᴀʏs ᴄᴏᴏʟᴅᴏᴡɴ ᴀғᴛᴇʀ ɪʟʟ ᴘᴜʀᴄʜᴀsᴇ ᴛʜᴇ ɪᴛᴇᴍ ʏᴏᴜ ᴡᴀɴᴛᴇᴅ ᴏɴ ʙɪᴛsᴋɪɴs ɪᴍ ɢᴏɪɴ ᴛᴏ ᴀsᴋ ʏᴏᴜʀ ᴛʀᴀᴅᴇ ᴜʀʟ sᴏ ɪ ᴄᴀɴ ᴘᴜᴛ ɪᴛ ᴀs ᴛʜᴇ ʀᴇᴄɪᴇᴠᴇʀ ᴏғ ᴛʜᴇ ɪᴛᴇᴍ , sᴏ ɪɴsᴛᴇᴀᴅ ᴏғ sᴇɴᴅɪɴɢ ᴍᴇ ᴛʜᴇ ᴏғғᴇʀ ᴏғ ᴛʜᴇ ʙɪᴛsᴋɪɴs ʏᴏᴜ ᴡɪʟʟ ɢᴏɪɴ ᴛᴏ ʀᴇᴄɪᴇᴠᴇ ɪᴛ ɴᴏᴛ ᴍᴇ

𝐑𝐄𝐌𝐈𝐍𝐃𝐄𝐑

ʏᴏᴜ ᴄᴀɴ ʀᴇᴄᴏʀᴅ ᴏʀ ᴛᴀᴋᴇ sᴄʀᴇᴇɴsʜᴏᴛs ᴏғ ᴛʜɪs ᴄᴏɴᴠᴇʀsᴀᴛɪᴏɴ ᴏʀ ᴡʜɪʟᴇ ʏᴏᴜ ᴀʀᴇ sᴇɴᴅɪɴɢ ᴍᴇ ᴛʜᴇ ᴛʀᴀᴅᴇ ᴏғғᴇʀ, sᴏ ʏᴏᴜ ʜᴀᴠᴇ sᴜᴄʜ ᴇᴠɪᴅᴇɴᴄᴇ ᴛᴏ sᴇʀᴠᴇ ɪғ ɪ ᴅᴏ ᴜɴsᴜᴀʟ ᴀᴄᴛɪᴠɪᴛɪᴇs. ʙᴇsɪᴅᴇs ʀᴇᴅᴅɪᴛ ᴏʀ ᴠᴀʟᴠᴇ ᴄᴀɴ ʜᴇʟᴘ ʏᴏᴜ ᴛᴏ ʀᴇᴘᴏʀᴛ ᴍᴇ ᴀɴᴅ ɢᴇᴛ ᴍᴇ ᴛʀᴀᴅᴇ ʙᴀɴ ᴛʜᴇɴ ʟᴏsᴛ ᴇᴠᴇʀʏᴛʜɪɴɢ.
